title: Immersive VR-Based Computer Hardware Component Identification Process

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of computer components (CPU, RAM, motherboard, etc.)
context.additional_context: Practical skills acquisition program for professionals, emphasizing experiential learning with VR equipment

learning_goals: Learners can identify over 15 major computer hardware components with 90% accuracy in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can explain physical connectivity relationships between hardware components through VR-based assembly/disassembly simulations.
Learners can classify components by functional categories (input/output/storage/processing devices, etc.) with 100% accuracy through post-learning assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
